title: Adding Reviews without Authentication
subtitle: "https://n.ethz.ch/~neth" websites have been removed
text:
ETH got rid of the n.ethz.ch websites, which we used for the authentication process. There is a chance that we can integrate the ETH login again but at the moment we depend on others to set it up.

In the meantime, you can still add reviews without authentication. This means you will not be able to edit them for now!
There is an option to provide a random string as an identifier when adding a review. Save this string somewhere safe, as you will need it to claim the review. That way you can edit or delete it again.

We apologize for the inconvenience and hope to have a proper authentication method again soon.

title: VVZ Extension
subtitle: CourseReview in VVZ
text: As switching between CourseReview and VVZ is tedious, we created this extension to make it easier. It shows the reviews for courses directly in VVZ.

title: Teaching Evaluation
subtitle: Those pesky mails you get after every exam
